snippet: The Treasury Department’s effort appears more of an informational exercise, rather than an attempt to establish new rules in the $12 billion industry.
abstract: Treasury Dept says it has begun study of online lending industry to see if regulations are keeping pace with its rapid growth; Treasury has asked for public comment and says it will hold round-table discussion on issue.
lead_paragraph: The Treasury Department’s effort appears more of an informational exercise, rather than an attempt to establish new rules in the $12 billion industry.

headline.main: Treasury to Examine Online Lending Industry
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Treasury to Examine Online Lending Industry
